pages.title: Maxima Clam
pages.text: The maxima clam ($(o)Tridacna maxima$()), also known as the small giant clam, is a species of bivalve mollusc found throughout the Indo-Pacific region.

pages.title: Maxima Clam
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★☆☆☆$(br2)Always active$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: None$(br2)Number of Offspring: 4$(br2)Growth time: 6 Days
